messages.message: I'm just now realizing that when I enabled refetchonWindowFocus, it didn't actually do anything because staleTile is set to Infinity :lolcry: Anyone have suggestions for a reasonable staleTime we should be using?

I think the default value is 0. React query consider all query results as stale immediately so that we'll refetch automatically when window is refocused.
https://tanstack.com/query/v4/docs/framework/react/guides/important-defaults
we should probably set the `cacheTime` back to default as well (5 mins)
Okay, so maybe I'll just get rid of the defaults we added altogether
